text: فَلَمَّا بَلَغَا مَجْمَعَ بَيْنِهِمَا نَسِيَا حُوتَهُمَا فَٱتَّخَذَ سَبِيلَهُۥ فِى ٱلْبَحْرِ سَرَبًا

translation.en.sahih: But when they reached the junction between them, they forgot their fish, and it took its course into the sea, slipping away.
translation.id.indonesian: Maka tatkala mereka sampai ke pertemuan dua buah laut itu, mereka lalai akan ikannya, lalu ikan itu melompat mengambil jalannya ke laut itu.
